item.title: 巴基斯坦希望在国际货币基金组织谈判中避免卢比贬值
item.description: 作为与国际货币基金组织谈判的一部分，巴基斯坦新政府预计货币不会大幅贬值，以释放数十亿美元的贷款并支持该国的经济改革议程。【原文：Pakistan’s new government does not anticipate any significant currency devaluation as part of its negotiations with the International Monetary Fund to unlock billions of dollars in lending and bolster the nation’s economic reform agenda.】

item.title: 莱因哈特参股铜金项目，扩大在厄瓜多尔的影响力
item.description: 澳大利亚女首富吉娜-莱因哈特（Gina Rinehart）通过参股一个极具前景的铜金矿项目，扩大了她在南美洲的足迹。【原文：Australia’s richest woman, Gina Rinehart, has grown her footprint in South America by taking a stake in a highly prospective copper-gold project.】

item.title: 墨西哥央行行长埃斯皮诺萨称长期宽松为时尚早
item.description: 墨西哥央行副行长艾琳-埃斯皮诺萨（Irene Espinosa）周三表示，现在谈论长期宽松周期还为时过早，因为距离墨西哥央行自2021年以来首次降息还不到一个月，市场还在等待下一步行动的线索。【原文：Mexico central bank Deputy Governor Irene Espinosa on Wednesday said it’s too soon to talk about a prolonged easing cycle, less than a month since the central bank cut interest rates for the first time since 2021 and with markets waiting for clues on the next step.】

item.title: 开始一天生活所需的五件事亚洲
item.description: 早上好美股遭遇一月以来最长连跌。俄罗斯和中国被认为正在减少左右美国投票的努力。拜登呼吁对中国钢铝征收更高的关税。市场动态如下。【原文：Good morning. US stocks suffer longest losing streak since January. Russia and China seen dialing back efforts to sway US vote. Biden calls for higher tariffs on Chinese steel and aluminum. Here’s what’s moving markets. — Isabelle Lee】

item.title: 美国石油库存增至 10 个月新高，石油止跌回升
item.description: 在美国全国原油库存达到 6 月份以来的最高水平后，石油创下了三个月来的最大跌幅。【原文：Oil held the largest decline in three months after US nationwide crude stockpiles hit the highest level since June.】

item.title: 沃尔玛支持的 Ibotta 公司和控股公司在首次公开募股中筹资 5.77 亿美元，定价高于发行区间
item.description: Ibotta Inc.是一家数字营销软件公司，其支持者包括沃尔玛公司（Walmart Inc.【原文：Ibotta Inc., a digital marketing software firm that counts Walmart Inc. as a backer, and a group of shareholders raised about $577.3 million in an initial public offering priced above a marketed range.】

item.title: Amundi 表示，日本公司治理的改善正在取得成效
item.description: 对于欧洲最大的基金管理公司 Amundi SA 来说，多年来呼吁日本改善公司治理的呼声终于有了结果。【原文：Years of calling for better corporate governance in Japan are finally bearing fruit for Amundi SA, Europe’s biggest money manager.】

item.title: 西南天然气部门通过 IPO 和伊坎交易获得 3.148 亿美元收益
item.description: Centuri Holdings Inc. 是电力公司西南燃气控股公司（Southwest Gas Holdings Inc.【原文：Centuri Holdings Inc., the infrastructure services business of power company Southwest Gas Holdings Inc., raised about $314.8 million in an initial public offering and concurrent private placement priced at the top of a marketed range.】

item.title: 亚洲股市承压，芯片制造商受关注：市场综述
item.description: 在美股将连跌扩大至 1 月份以来最长跌势之后，亚洲股市将在开盘后面临压力。【原文：Asian stocks are set to be under pressure from the open after US shares extended their losing streak to the longest since January.】

item.title: Evercore的伊曼纽尔称美股低迷将愈演愈烈
item.description: Evercore ISI 公司的朱利安-伊曼纽尔（Julian Emanuel）认为，股市在从上个月创下的历史高点回落后，正迎来下行的开始，并将持续到 2024 年剩余时间。【原文：The stock market is witnessing the start of a downdraft that will run through the rest of 2024 after retreating from an all-time high hit last month, according to Evercore ISI’s Julian Emanuel.】

item.title: Cumulus 在首次报价招致反对后，接近与贷款人达成新协议
item.description: Cumulus Media 公司即将与部分债权人达成协议，延长超过 6.5 亿美元债务的到期日，这标志着贷款人的胜利，因为他们通过谈判获得了比最初提议更好的条件。【原文：Cumulus Media Inc. is nearing a deal with some of its creditors to extend the maturities of more than $650 million of debt, marking a win for lenders who negotiated better terms than originally proposed.】

item.title: 随着日本央行押注减少，巴菲特的伯克希尔公司目标缩小日元债券利差
item.description: 沃伦-巴菲特（Warren Buffett）的伯克希尔-哈撒韦公司（Berkshire Hathaway Inc.【原文：Warren Buffett’s Berkshire Hathaway Inc. is seeking the lowest premiums on yen bonds in more than two years as concern recedes in the credit market that the Bank of Japan will raise interest rates again soon.】

item.title: 杰里米-亨特称泰晤士河水务公司的客户不应为其错误买单
item.description: 英国财政大臣杰里米-亨特（Jeremy Hunt）表示，英国消费者不应该为陷入困境的公用事业公司泰晤士水务公司（Thames Water）管理层所犯的错误买单。【原文：Chancellor Jeremy Hunt said consumers in the UK shouldn’t foot the bill for mistakes made by the management of struggling utility Thames Water.】

item.title: 世界银行 350 亿美元计划为 3 亿非洲人接通电力
item.description: 世界银行集团计划与非洲开发银行（African Development Bank）合作，为 3 亿非洲人接通电力，这一雄心勃勃的项目将在 2030 年前把非洲大陆无电人口减少一半。【原文：The World Bank Group plans to connect 300 million Africans to electricity in partnership with with the African Development Bank, under an ambitious project that would halve the number of people living without access to power on the continent by 2030.】

item.title: 金沙集团销售额和盈利因澳门经济复苏和新加坡经济增长而增长
item.description: 拉斯维加斯金沙集团（Las Vegas Sands Corp. ）公布的第一季度销售额和利润超过了分析师的预期，澳门赌场业继续从与大流行病相关的限制中复苏。【原文：Las Vegas Sands Corp. reported first-quarter sales and profit that exceeded analysts’ projections as Macau’s casino industry continued its recovery from pandemic-related restrictions.】

item.title: BPI 的比尔-尼尔森（Bill Nelson）认为美联储将储备金推低至阻力点以下
item.description: 银行政策研究所（Bank Policy Institute）研究主管比尔-尼尔森（Bill Nelson）认为，随着美联储缩减资产负债表，政策制定者有可能在储备余额稀缺的情况下继续放松。【原文：As the Federal Reserve shrinks its balance sheet, there’s a chance policymakers will keep unwinding passed the point of scarcity in reserve balances, according to Bill Nelson, head of research at the Bank Policy Institute.】

item.title: 交易员逆势押注美联储将提前减产
item.description: 利率期货市场上的交易商们正在进行逆向押注，如果美联储今年采取积极的货币宽松政策，这种押注将获得回报。【原文：Traders in the interest-rate futures market are piling into a contrarian bet that would pay off in the event of aggressive Federal Reserve monetary easing this year.】

item.title: 尼日利亚卡多佐称外汇储备变化并非因捍卫奈拉所致
item.description: 尼日利亚中央银行行长奥拉耶米-卡多索（Olayemi Cardoso）说，奈拉最近的上涨是对为抑制通货膨胀而采取的政策行动的积极评价，而不是因为当局一直在干预支持奈拉。【原文：Central Bank of Nigeria Governor Olayemi Cardoso said the naira’s recent rise is a positive verdict on policy action taken to curb inflation, not because the authorities have been intervening in its support.】

item.title: 美国通胀出了什么问题
item.description: 今年本应是美国通胀率降至2%的最后一年，让美联储从二十年来的高点稳步降低利率。现在，这些期望落空了。【原文：This was supposed to be the year that US inflation rode the last mile down to 2%, letting the Federal Reserve steadily reduce interest rates from a two-decade high. Now those expectations have been dashed.】

item.title: 拉加德称欧元区经济出现复苏迹象
item.description: 欧洲央行行长克里斯蒂娜-拉加德（Christine Lagarde）表示，欧洲经济已接近结束一年多来几近停滞的萎靡不振状态。【原文：Europe’s economy is nearing the end of a malaise that’s resulted in more than a year of near stagnation, according to European Central Bank President Christine Lagarde.】

item.title: 以色列、伊朗和风险激增
item.description:
在本期《市井》节目中，地缘政治策略师蒂娜-福特汉姆（Tina Fordham）警告说，市场应该清醒地认识到中东局势升级带来的威胁。【原文：

On this episode of In the City, geopolitical strategist Tina Fordham warns that markets should wake up to the threat posed by Middle East escalation.

】

item.title: 纽约联储称量化紧缩政策可能在 2025 年停止
item.description: 根据纽约联邦储备银行的预测，美国中央银行可能会在 2025 年停止资产负债表的放松。【原文：The US central bank could halt the unwind of its balance sheet in 2025, according to Federal Reserve Bank of New York projections.】

item.title: 体育广播公司钻石公司将举行重组计划投票
item.description: 钻石体育集团（Diamond Sports Group）将就亚马逊公司（Amazon.com Inc.）支持的破产退出计划举行债权人投票，同时该广播公司将努力与美国两大体育联盟谈判新的电视转播协议。【原文：Diamond Sports Group will hold a creditor vote on a bankruptcy-exit plan backed by Amazon.com Inc. while the broadcaster tries to negotiate new television deals with two major US sports leagues.】

item.title: 巴西中央银行警告投资者不确定性增加
item.description: 巴西央行行长罗伯托-坎波斯-内托（Roberto Campos Neto）告诉投资者，自上次货币政策会议以来，不确定性增加了，因为经济学家们在权衡决策者们是否会放慢降息步伐。【原文：Brazil’s central bank head Roberto Campos Neto told investors that uncertainties have increased since the last monetary policy meeting as economists weigh odds that policymakers will slow interest rate cuts.】

item.title: 曾在雷曼工作的债券市场专家杰克-马尔维逝世，享年 72 岁
item.description: 约翰-"杰克"-马尔维（John "Jack" Malvey）逝世，他在债券市场受人尊敬，从业数十年，曾长期担任雷曼兄弟控股公司（Lehman Brothers Holdings Inc.享年 72 岁。【原文：John “Jack” Malvey, a respected figure in the bond market whose decades in the industry included a long run as Lehman Brothers Holdings Inc.’s chief strategist in fixed income, has died. He was 72.】

item.title: 渴望收益的投资者抢购 20 年期美国国债
item.description: 20 年期美国国债拍卖吸引了强劲的需求，这表明接近年内最高水平的收益率为投资者提供了足够的补偿，以应对经济增长和通胀趋势将阻止美联储降息的风险。【原文：An auction of 20-year US Treasury bonds drew strong demand, suggesting that yields near the highest levels of the year offer investors enough compensation for the risk that growth and inflation trends will forestall Federal Reserve interest-rate cuts.】

item.title: 尼日利亚限制银行发放贷款以减少市场流动性
item.description: 尼日利亚中央银行限制银行发放贷款的能力，以减少市场流动性，帮助降低 3 月份升至 28 年新高的通货膨胀率。【原文：Nigeria’s central bank curbed the ability of banks to grant loans as it seeks to reduce market liquidity and help reduce an inflation rate that rose to a 28-year high in March.】

item.title: 森特诺称欧洲央行不会以美国经济为导向来设定利率
item.description: 马里奥-森特诺【原文：Mario Centeno】

item.title: 雷亚尔汇率跌至世界最差水平，吸引了一批特殊的熊市投资者
item.description: 外国基金正在加大对巴西雷亚尔的押注，使巴西雷亚尔成为全球表现最差的主要货币，原因是当地负面新闻不断，全球利率前景也被大幅重估。【原文：Foreign funds are stepping up bets against the Brazilian real, turning the currency into the worst major performer in the world amid a mix of negative local news and a massive repricing of the outlook for global interest rates.】

item.title: 蓬勃发展的首次公开募股背后的新泽西州小经纪商携 380% 的大手笔卷土重来
item.description: 两年前，一家名不见经传的新泽西经纪公司曾引领了全球最疯狂的股票发行，这次它又回来了，这家新加坡远程医疗初创公司上周上市，成为今年美国最热门的首次公开发行股票公司。【原文：A little-known New Jersey brokerage that led the world’s wildest stock offerings just two years ago is back, this time with a Singaporean telehealth startup that went public last week and is now the year’s hottest US initial public offering.】
